<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_report</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete Widget Navigation entry</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*undefined when async or display*/) {
var wigNavGr = new GlideRecord('widget_navigation'); wigNavGr.addQuery('widget', current.sys_id); wigNavGr.query(); while(wigNavGr.next()){ wigNavGr.deleteRecord(); gs.addDebugMessage('Widget Navigation for report ' + current.sys_id + ' is deleted'); }
})(current, typeof previous != 'undefined' ? previous : null);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-08-24 08:16:11</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>1268cc7667002300f55f4d9e1585ef40</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete Widget Navigation entry</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Reporting" source="com.glideapp.report">4433b8603c31311068bcf327dfe37f37</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1268cc7667002300f55f4d9e1585ef40</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:01:56</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1268cc7667002300f55f4d9e1585ef40"/> </record_update>
